entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: $\texttt{I AK IOI}$ 111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111点击显/隐内容 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int n,t1=0,t2=0,a=0,b=0;int main(){ scanf("%d",&n); for(int k=1;k<=n;k++) { scanf("%d",&t2); if(t2>t1) a+=1; else b=(a>b)?a:b,a=0; t1=t2; } return printf("%d\n",b+1),0;}#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int n,t1=0,t2=0,a=0,b=0;int main(){ scanf("%d",&n); for(int k=1;k<=n;k++) { scanf("%d",&t2); if(t2>t1) a+=1; else b=(a>b)?a:b,a=0; t1=t2; } return printf("%d\n",b+1),0;}
